TopicTitle: Back to KSP, This Time For Real

Articles.Content: Hello. Ahem. Well, I made a thread rather similar to this one a few months ago, because I thought that I'd have time to do all this. Not so much, I was quite busy with various things and for a bit was not that interested in space exploration, but now I am interested yet again, and all because of a space book I picked up to read. Those astronaut autobiographies are amazing, Jeb should try writing one at one point. "Being a BadS, no, Being THE BadS, by Jeb Kerman." Anyway, I owe you guys my apologies for saying that I'd be active and then not being so much, but I am happy to be back with all you guys and to share tales about KSP, space exploration and more.

Hello CaptainApollo and welcome back.

I look forward to seeing you around.

Happy landings!
Thank you Starhawk for the warm welcome, I look forward to seeing you around as well.
Welcome back! (yet again)

9 minutes ago, legoclone09 said:

Welcome back! (yet again) 

Ditto

On 5/23/2016 at 3:30 PM, CaptainApollo said:

I owe you guys my apologies for saying that I'd be active and then not being so much, but I am happy to be back with all you guys and to share tales about KSP, space exploration and more. 

This is pretty much what I said a while ago right before I got another long burnout.
